abstract.text: Creates a new Core Video texture cache.

abstract.text: Process digital video, including manipulation of individual frames, using a pipeline-based API and support for both Metal and OpenGL.
A type that resolves to an
A reference to a Core Video image buffer.
A reference to a Core Video texture-based image buffer.
Creates a new Core Video texture cache.
Performs internal housekeeping/recycling operations on a texture cache.
Returns the Core Foundation type identifier for a Core Video texture cache.
A Core Video error type return value.

An [`EAGLContext`](doc://com.apple.opengles/documentation/OpenGLES/EAGLContext) object manages an OpenGL ES *rendering context*—the state information, commands, and resources needed to draw using OpenGL ES. To execute OpenGL ES commands, you need a current rendering context.
A reference to a CFAllocator object.
A reference to an immutable dictionary object.

A reference to an immutable dictionary object.
A pointer for accessing and manipulating data of a specific type.
